ğŸ“‹ å®ç°ä¼˜å…ˆçº§ (ä¿®è®¢) P0 - æ ¸å¿ƒç”Ÿå‘½å‘¨æœŸ (ç«‹å³å®ç°) âœ… CommunityLaunchpad (å·²å®Œæˆ) âœ… StakingManager (å·²å®Œæˆ) âœ… OperatorLifecycle (å·²å®Œæˆï¼Œéœ€è¡¥å……é€€å‡º) ğŸ”„ UserLifecycle (å®Œæ•´ç‰ˆï¼Œå«Gasless) ğŸ”„ SuperPaymasterOperator (æ–°å¢) ğŸ”„ ProtocolGovernance (å¢å¼ºç‰ˆ) P1 - ç®¡ç†å¢å¼º (ä¸‹ä¸€é˜¶æ®µ) ReputationManager NFTManager DVTNodeManager KMSNodeManager P2 - å·¥å…·å‡½æ•° GaslessHelper - Paymasteré…ç½®å·¥å…· RoleHelper - è§’è‰²æƒé™æ£€æŸ¥å·¥å…· ğŸ§ª éªŒè¯è®¡åˆ’ Scenarioå®Œæ•´æµ‹è¯• // examples/l3-complete-lifecycle-demo.ts async function fullEcosystemDemo() { // 1. åè®®å¯åŠ¨ const protocol = new ProtocolGovernance(config); await protocol.setGlobalMinStake(...);
